cities.name: Sydney, Australia
cities.description: A vibrant city known for its iconic landmarks like the Sydney Opera House and Sydney Harbour Bridge, with stunning beaches.

cities.name: Melbourne, Australia
cities.description: A cultural hub known for its art, food, and coffee culture, with beautiful parks and gardens.

cities.name: Tokyo, Japan
cities.description: A bustling metropolis blending tradition and modernity, featuring historic temples alongside futuristic skyscrapers.

cities.name: Kyoto, Japan
cities.description: Ancient capital with beautiful temples, traditional gardens, and geisha culture.

cities.name: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
cities.description: Famous for Christ the Redeemer statue, Carnival, and stunning beaches like Copacabana and Ipanema.

cities.name: SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil
cities.description: The largest city in South America, known for its vibrant nightlife, diverse culture, and excellent cuisine.

temples.name: Angkor Wat, Cambodia
temples.description: The largest religious monument in the world, originally constructed as a Hindu temple dedicated to Vishnu, later transformed into a Buddhist temple.

temples.name: Taj Mahal, India
temples.description: An ivory-white marble mausoleum, regarded as the jewel of Muslim art in India and one of the universally admired masterpieces.

temples.name: Borobudur Temple, Indonesia
temples.description: The world's largest Buddhist temple, featuring intricate stone carvings and over 500 Buddha statues.

beaches.name: Bora Bora, French Polynesia
beaches.description: A stunning island paradise with crystal-clear turquoise waters, overwater bungalows, and coral reefs perfect for snorkeling.

beaches.name: Maldives Beach
beaches.description: White sandy beaches with incredibly clear blue waters, perfect for diving and relaxing in tropical paradise.

beaches.name: Copacabana Beach, Brazil
beaches.description: Famous beach with golden sands, lively atmosphere, and stunning views of Sugarloaf Mountain.
